Class Penalty1Lv2

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.controller.State.AdventureState
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.controller.State.CombatZoneStates.Lv2.Penalty1Lv2
public class Penalty1Lv2 extends AdventureState
Represents the penalty state at Combat Zone Level 2 where the player with the lowest firepower is penalized by moving backward on the route.

This state is triggered after all players have completed the first firepower check. The player identified as having the minimum firepower receives a penalty (lost days), and the game advances to the next engine power check (Check2Lv2).

    Penalty1Lv2(AdventurePhase advContext, Player player)
    Constructs the Penalty1Lv2 state, applies the movement penalty to the given player, and immediately transitions the state machine to Check2Lv2.
